page.title: 01Parkend _ Forest of Dean
page.content: Our area is typical of the Forest of Dean in Gloustershire .Parkend is in the middle of our squares and is a quiet village surrounded by forest .The Forest of Dean is managed by the Forestry Commission and is a mixture of decidous and coniferous trees .Large areas are regularly felled , harvested and re_planted .In 1981 the area around Parkend School was clear _felled .The school children were invited by the Forestry Commission to help re_plant the areas bordering the school with a variety of decidous trees e.g. Oaks, Ash Beech and Elm.The area has many visitors to marvel at the abundance of wildlife and plants .Parkend Village is small but its resourceful inhabitants organize many activites and events for young and old .
